H0.text: Amanuensis is an archaic word for what profession. Scribe

H1.text: Amanuensis is an archaic word for what profession. Clerk

H2.text: Amanuensis is an archaic word for what profession. Translator

H3.text: Amanuensis is an archaic word for what profession. Sec'y

A4.text: Amanuensis... or scribe is a person employed to write or type what another dictates or to copy what has been written by another.

A5.text: An amanuensis might act as a translator as well as transcriber.

A6.text: The work of scribes can involve secretarial and administrative duties such as the taking of dictation and keeping of business, judicial, and historical records for kings, nobles, temples, and cities.
